title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning Design Workshop: ILDE-Based Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more collaborative learning activities using the ILDE platform.
Learners can develop two or more deployable social domain educational scenarios for a Virtual Learning Environment (VLE).
Learners can iteratively improve learning designs two or more times by reflecting on peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
